block.name: Delay
block.doc: Implements a delay equal to the specified number of samples.

param.name: Type
param.doc: Specifies the data type of the input and output.

option.name: Complex
option.doc: Input and output are complex values.

option.name: Float
option.doc: Input and output are floating point (real) values.

option.name: Int
option.doc: Input and output are integer values.

option.name: Short
option.doc: Input and output are short integer values.

option.name: Byte
option.doc: Input and output are byte values.

param.name: Delay
param.doc: Specifies the delay in samples. Note that the actual delay time depends on the sample rate in this branch of the flowgraph.

param.name: Num Ports
param.doc: Specifies the number of inputs/outputs. Essentially creates parallel delay lines.

param.name: Vec Length
param.doc: Specifies the vector length for vector processing. Typical applications will use the default value of 1.
